attributes.action:
Do more for our children!
Change in social care protocols.
attributes.additional_details: I want the protocol changed! There are too many hoops to jump through before something can be done. Children are slipping through the cracks.. there should be no cracks. The whole system needs reviewing and it needs to be changed.
attributes.background: I want the government to look at social care protocol from start to finish. From referral stage, right through the end. Something isn’t working and children are suffering. We need to help save these innocent children from anymore harm!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to change. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
